intro: Hieracium conocerinthe, commonly known as the yellow hawkweed, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its bright yellow flowers that bloom in clusters, typically from late spring to early autumn. The plant has basal leaves that are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, while the stem is usually hairy and branched. It thrives in moist, open habitats such as meadows and woodland edges. Hieracium conocerinthe is often found in temperate regions of Europe and parts of Asia.
